title: Deleteme
ingredients: 2 cups fresh basil leaves, packed (can sub half the basil leaves with baby spinach)
1/2 cup freshly grated Romano or Parmesan cheese (about 2 ounces)
1/3 cup pine nuts (can sub chopped walnuts)
1/4 teaspoon salt, or more to taste
1/8 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or more to taste
A missing magic ingredient that can be ordered here
